Strings.Text: To get across the lake, you need \nto use the boat.{pause}
It is locked. To unlock, you need \nthe City's Key Card.{pause}
This elevator isn't powered at \nthe moment. It won't operate.{pause}
The diver's suit is too small for \nDylan.{pause}{clear}Dylan cannot go underwater.{pause}
It must have been in repair. The \ninside of the engine is exposed.{pause}
There are many small items. None \nof them appear to be usable.{pause}

It's a control panel for a small 
crane.{pause}{clear}The operational instructions are 
written on the panel above,{pause}{clear}but the power unit is burned and 
it's impossible to operate.{pause}
It's a small crane for lifting and \nmoving heavy items.{pause}{clear}Many tiny insect like organisms \nare on the weathered surface of {pause}{clear}the machine.{pause}
It's a large machine used to raise \nand repair the jet bikes.{pause}{clear}The mechanical parts have \ncorroded away and there are {pause}{clear}insects on them.{pause}
The diver's suit is too small for \nDylan.{pause}{clear}Dylan cannot go underwater.{pause}
{pic}Regina used the city's key card \nand released the lock.{delay 28732}{clear}{pic}Must hurry to Edward City.{delay 28732}
You can go to the underwater \nreactor.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the elevator?{0x3000}
Wearing the diver's suit to go \ndown to the underwater reactor.{delay 28702}
